longBusinessSummary: Kirloskar Industries Limited manufactures and sells iron castings in India. The company generates and sells wind-power electricity through windmills in Maharashtra. It engages in real estate activities; owns apartments, offices, lands, and buildings. In addition, the company invests in properties and securities. Further, it manufactures steel and seamless tubes. The company was formerly known as Kirloskar Oil Engines Limited and changed its name to Kirloskar Industries Limited in March 2010. Kirloskar Industries Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Pune, India.
